talk.author: did:plc:65m7rasokfsrevmn6bakbykc
talk.utter: Meanwhile, I noticed Twitter2 was trending over on X.

talk.author: did:plc:ybgdrhv6yucoygebyovsu2ba
talk.utter: I think there might be a market for it here. My sons used the original Mixi to keep up with their friends, but have no interest in FB or Instagram, etc. One question is whether they or their friends get invitations so they can resume connecting.

talk.author: did:plc:65m7rasokfsrevmn6bakbykc
talk.utter: Certainly I think it's possible to improve on X and with a name that people know, maybe it has a chance.
